Detailed Description

The class MptyCallHdl is intended to represent multi-party calls. It provides methods for all common operations on multi-party calls, like Release, Hold, Retrieve, etc. Furthermore, methods are available to access the members of the multi-party call, the time when the multi-party call was set up, and some comparison methods. Also available are methods, which indicate if a corresponding operation (like Hold, Retrieve, Split, etc.) is permitted for the respective MptyCallHdl.
The class keeps the number of the channel where the multi-party call is located.

Member Function Documentation

TimeSpan MptyCallHdl::GetCallDuration (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a TimeSpan object for the duration of the call represented by a CallHdl. The method is applicable to MptyCallHdl.

Returns:
A zero value if the MptyCallHdl is not valid. Also zero if a single call has not been successfully established. The time span from the successful establishment of of a single call or multiparty call to the time of execution of this method.

Implements CallHdlBase.

virtual CallIndex MptyCallHdl::GetCallIndex (   )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Default implementation. Returns c_mpty_indication.

See also:
MptyCallHdl::GetMemberCount and MptyCallHdl::GetMember for more information how to access multi-party call data.

Implements CallHdlBase.

CallHdl MptyCallHdl::GetMember (  INT  pos = 0  )  const
 

Returns a CallHdl referring to the call which is found at the position pos in the multi-party call. If no call is found at position pos a CallHdl with CallIndex c_null_call_index, i.e., an invalid CallHdl is returned.

Parameters:
pos The position of the member in the multi-party call.
Returns:
A CallHdl object.

INT MptyCallHdl::GetMemberCount (   )  const
 

Returns the number of members of a multi-party call.

MptyCallHdl MptyCallHdl::GetMptyCallHdl (   )  [static]
 

Returns a MptyCallHdl object with a reference to the multi- party call. If no multi-party call exists, the MptyCallHdl() will refer to the c_null_channel_no.

Returns:
A MptyCallHdl referring to the multi-party call.

ChannelNo MptyCallHdl::GetMptyChannelNo (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the channel nunber of the MptyCallHdl object.

DateTime MptyCallHdl::GetStartTime (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the time at the point where the multi-party call was established.

Returns:
The time of multi-party call setup.

Implements CallHdlBase.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::Hold (   )  [virtual]
 

Holds all calls of an active multi-party call.

Returns:
NoError - If executed successfully. In case of any error, one of the following values is returned: CallDataLocked, HeldCallDetected, ActiveCallRequired, InvalidCallIndex, VoidCallIndex, CallDisconnected, SupplementaryServiceFailed, HoldRequestRejected.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::Release (  TimeSpan *  calling_time = 0,
BOOLEAN  wait_condition = FALSE
)  [virtual]
 

Releases all members of a multi-party call and terminates the multi- party call. The multi-party call may be in state active or hold. The internal data structures are updated immediately, since the MN confirms the release if the network fails to confirm the release within 30 sec.

Parameters:
call_duration The duration of the mpty-call (TimeSpan).
wait_condition TRUE for synchronous waiting of release
Returns:
NoError - If executed successfully .In case of an error, one of the following values is returned: CallDataLocked, InvalidCallIndex, VoidCallIndex.

Implements CallHdlBase.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::Retrieve (   )  [virtual]
 

Retrieves all calls of a previously held multi-party call.

Returns:
NoError - If executed successfully.In case of any error, one of the following values is returned: CallDataLocked, ActiveCallDetected, HeldCallRequired, InvalidCallIndex, VoidCallIndex, CallDisconnected, SupplementaryServiceFailed, RetrieveRequestRejected.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::Split (  const CallHdl &  active_call  )  const
 

Sets an active multiy-party call to hold except of one particular call defined by active_call

Parameters:
active_call The call to be splitted off the multy-party call.
Returns:
NoError - In case of successful execution. In case of any error, one of the following values will be returned: CallDataLocked, ActiveMptyRequired, HeldCallDetected, CallNotMptyMember, InvalidCallIndex, VoidCallIndex, CallDisconnected, SupplementaryServiceFailed.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::StartDtmfToneGeneration (  KeyCode  key  )  [virtual]
 

Starts the generation of a DTMF tone during an active voice call. Refer to the documentation of CallApiRc for a detailed description of the return values.

Parameters:
key A KeyCode 0, 1, ... 9, * or #.
Returns:
NoError - If successful. In case of an error, one of the following values is returned: CallDataLocked, VoidCallIndex, InvalidCallIndex, ActiveCallRequired, SpeechCallRequired, InvalidMptyMemberCount,

Reimplemented from CallHdlBase.

CallApiRc MptyCallHdl::StopDtmfToneGeneration (   )  [virtual]
 

Stops the started generation of a DTMF tone.

Returns:
See CallHdl::StartDtmfToneGeneration(...).

Reimplemented from CallHdlBase.
